title: LF P3+ Top laner for circuit-style tournament.
body:
Looking for a P3+ Top laner to play in SumSoc's Oceanic Circuit tournament on the 26th of September. We placed 2nd in the last one.
The tournament will go for about 9 weeks, and is run on Monday nights between 6pm and 10-11pm. We scrim regularly and are all ranked d5+. 
Our team name is Ashen eSports.

Add "King" or "Gryffindor" in-game if interested. Thankyou for reading!
